title: The Straight Story
description: Based on a true story, an elderly man embarks on a journey across the Midwest on a lawnmower to reconcile with his estranged brother who suffered a stroke.

title: Ant-Man
description: Con artist Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the secret of the Ant-Man technology from a new generation of towering threats.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
description: Scott Lang teams up with Hope van Dyne to uncover secrets from their past while battling a new villain, all while navigating the challenges of fatherhood.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
description: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne, along with their families, find themselves in the Quantum Realm, where they must confront new threats and uncover secrets that could change their lives forever.

title: Jingle All The Way
description: A father struggles to find a Turbo Man action figure for his son on Christmas Eve, racing against time and a rival dad to fulfill his promise.

title: Jingle All The Way
description: A father struggles to find a Turbo Man action figure for his son on Christmas Eve, racing against time and a rival dad to fulfill his promise.

title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
description: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones is a science fiction film directed by George Lucas. Set in the midst of the Clone Wars, the film follows Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Senator Padmé Amidala as they navigate political intrigue and forbidden romance. As tensions rise and dark forces plot against the Republic, Anakin's journey to becoming a Jedi Knight becomes increasingly entangled with his feelings for Padmé and the lure of the dark side. With its epic battles, stunning visual effects, and iconic characters, Attack of the Clones is a thrilling chapter in the Star Wars saga.

title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
description: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith is a science fiction film directed by George Lucas. Set during the final days of the Clone Wars, the film depicts the tragic fall of Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker to the dark side of the Force and his transformation into the Sith Lord Darth Vader. As the Galactic Republic crumbles and the Jedi Order faces extinction, Anakin's descent into darkness becomes inexorable, leading to confrontations with his former mentor Obi-Wan Kenobi and the rise of the tyrannical Galactic Empire. With its epic battles, emotional depth, and stunning visual effects, Revenge of the Sith is a pivotal chapter in the Star Wars saga.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope is a science fiction film directed by George Lucas. Set in a galaxy far, far away, the film follows the young farm boy Luke Skywalker as he embarks on an epic journey to rescue Princess Leia from the clutches of the evil Darth Vader and the tyrannical Galactic Empire. Along the way, Luke teams up with the wise Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, portrayed by Alec Guinness, the roguish smuggler Han Solo, and the loyal droid duo R2-D2 and C-3PO. With its groundbreaking special effects, iconic characters, and timeless story of good versus evil, A New Hope became a cultural phenomenon and launched the beloved Star Wars franchise.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back is a science fiction film directed by Irvin Kershner. Set shortly after the events of 'A New Hope,' the film follows the Rebel Alliance as they are pursued by the evil Galactic Empire. Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, and Han Solo seek refuge on the remote planet of Dagobah, where Luke trains under the guidance of the wise Jedi Master Yoda. Meanwhile, Darth Vader relentlessly pursues Luke, hoping to turn him to the dark side of the Force. With its epic battles, shocking plot twists, and iconic moments, The Empire Strikes Back is widely regarded as one of the greatest sequels in cinematic history.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
description: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi is a science fiction film directed by Richard Marquand. Set after the events of 'The Empire Strikes Back,' the film follows the Rebel Alliance as they launch a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from the clutches of the vile gangster Jabba the Hutt. Meanwhile, Luke Skywalker continues his training as a Jedi Knight under the guidance of Master Yoda. As the Rebel fleet prepares to face the Empire's new Death Star, Luke confronts his father, Darth Vader, in a final showdown between the forces of good and evil. With its thrilling action sequences, epic battles, and emotional climax, Return of the Jedi concludes the original Star Wars trilogy in spectacular fashion.

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
description: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens is a science fiction film directed by J.J. Abrams. Set 30 years after the events of 'Return of the Jedi,' the film follows a new generation of heroes, including Rey, Finn, and Poe Dameron, as they join forces with the Resistance to combat the sinister First Order and search for the missing Jedi, Luke Skywalker. Along the way, they encounter familiar faces from the past, including Han Solo, portrayed by Harrison Ford, and General Leia Organa, and confront the dark legacy of the Sith. With its thrilling action, compelling characters, and return to the spirit of the original trilogy, The Force Awakens reinvigorated the Star Wars franchise for a new era.

title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
description: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi is a science fiction film written and directed by Rian Johnson. Continuing the saga set forth by 'The Force Awakens,' the film follows Rey as she seeks out Jedi Master Luke Skywalker to receive training in the ways of the Force. Meanwhile, the Resistance, led by General Leia Organa, faces off against the First Order in a desperate battle for survival. As secrets from the past are revealed and loyalties are tested, the fate of the galaxy hangs in the balance. With its stunning visuals, epic battles, and deep exploration of the Force, The Last Jedi challenges the very essence of what it means to be a hero.

title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
description: In the final chapter of the Skywalker saga, the Resistance faces the First Order once more as Rey, Finn, and Poe Dameron continue their fight against the dark forces threatening the galaxy. As Rey's journey to discover her true identity unfolds, she must confront the return of Emperor Palpatine and the truth about her connection to the Force. With old friends and new allies by their side, the heroes of the Resistance embark on a perilous mission to stop the rise of evil and restore hope to the galaxy.

title: The BFG
description: An orphan little girl befriends a benevolent giant who takes her to Giant Country, where they attempt to stop the man-eating giants that are invading the human world.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: Renowned archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
description: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old man's notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
description: Indiana Jones teams up with a nightclub singer named Wilhelmina Willie Scott and a twelve-year-old Chinese boy named Short Round. They end up in a small distressed village in India, where the people believe that evil spirits have taken all their children away after a sacred precious stone was stolen. They also discover the great mysterious terror surrounding a booby-trapped temple known as the Temple of Doom. Thuggee is beginning to attempt to rise once more, believing that with the power of all five Sankara stones they can rule the world. It's all up to Indiana to put an end to the Thuggee campaign, rescue the lost children, win the girl and conquer the Temple of Doom.

title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
description: It's the height of the Cold War, and famous archaeologist Indiana Jones (Harrison Ford), returning from his latest adventure, finds out his job at Marshall College is in jeopardy. He meets Mutt (Shia La Beouf), a young man who wants Indy to help him find the legendary Crystal Skull of Akator, and the pair set out for Peru. However, deadly agent Irina Spalko (Cate Blanchett) is searching for the powerful artifact, too, because the Soviets believe it can help them conquer the world.

title: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace
description: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.

title: Morbius
description: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others from the same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. While at first it seems to be a radical success, a darkness inside of him is soon unleashed.

title: The Marvels
description: Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. However, unintended consequences see her shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe. When her duties send her to an anomalous wormhole linked to a Kree revolutionary, her powers become entangled with two other superheroes to form the Marvels.

title: X-Men: First Class
description: In 1962, Charles Xavier starts up a school and later a team, for humans with superhuman abilities. Among them is Erik Lensherr, his best friend... and future archenemy.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Finding Dory
description: Finding Dory is a 2016 American computer-animated adventure film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures. Directed by Andrew Stanton with co-direction by Angus MacLane, the screenplay was written by Stanton and Victoria Strouse. The film is a sequel to the 2003 film Finding Nemo and features the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks, Ed O'Neill, Kaitlin Olson, Ty Burrell, Diane Keaton, and Eugene Levy. The story follows Dory, a regal blue tang fish who suffers from short-term memory loss, as she embarks on a journey to be reunited with her parents.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Toy Story 2
description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: Toy Story 3
description: Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and the rest of the gang embark on a road trip with Bonnie and a new toy named Forky. The adventurous journey turns into an unexpected reunion as Woody's slight detour leads him to his long-lost friend Bo Peep.

title: Toy Story 4
description: When a new toy called 'Forky' joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: Lightyear
description: Legendary space ranger Buzz Lightyear embarks on an intergalactic adventure alongside ambitious recruits Izzy, Mo, Darby, and his robot companion, Sox. As this motley crew tackles their toughest mission yet, they must learn to work together as a team to escape the evil Zurg and his dutiful robot army that are never far behind.

title: Wall-E
description: Wall-E is a 2008 American computer-animated science fiction film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures. It follows a solitary robot named Wall-E, who is tasked with cleaning up a deserted Earth far in the future.

title: X2
description: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

title: Captain America: Civil War
description: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa is the heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda and he must step forward to lead his people into a new future and confront a challenger from his country's past.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Iron Man
description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

title: The Incredible Hulk
description: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

title: Iron Man 2
description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

title: Thor
description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: After being deemed unfit for military service, Steve Rogers volunteers for a top-secret research project that turns him into Captain America, a superhero dedicated to defending America's ideals.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: West Side Story
description: A musical drama film about the forbidden romance between Tony, a former member of the Jets, and Maria, the sister of the leader of the rival gang, the Sharks, set in 1950s New York City.
